programme.sub-title: Too Much Sex And Fighting, Teen Girls Confronted!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Stop The Sex and Fighting ... You're Only 14!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: We Had A Threesome ... Now My Wife Has A Secret!
programme.desc: Did Rachel's fiance Louis really cheat on her while she was battling cancer? Then, Kristy and Brandon tried to spice up their relationship by adding another lover. But now that decision may have doomed their love for good!

programme.sub-title: Is My Husband Sneaking Prostitutes Into Our House? Test Him!
programme.desc: These accused cheaters will be put to the ultimate lie-detector test! But after the results are read, will the accused clear their names and fix their relationships? Or will these women just be searching for more answers as well as more faithful partners?

programme.sub-title: I Was A Wild Teen…Are You The Father Of My 2 Kids?
programme.desc: Wild party girl Hanna, met John when she was 19 and cheated on him twice, both times she conceived her 2 kids.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: They're Back With More Secrets...Shocking Updates!

programme.title: Maury

programme.sub-title: Did My Man Father My Sister's Baby? PT 1
programme.desc: Brea is here to prove to Greg that he is the father of her child. But Greg denied her and her baby, leaving them in the streetl Then, Aerial's family treated Justin like one of their own. But now he's denying he's the father of her child.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Double-Crossing An Expert Witness
programme.desc: David is suing William after testifying for him in criminal court, and wants to be paid the wages he's owed.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Backup Crackup
programme.desc: Joseph Tar Schmidt, Sr. says his car was parked in a parking lot and the defendant backed his car into it and dented the back quarter panel. Now the defendant is refusing to pay for his car to be fixed. Archi says he and the plaintiff were both driving in the parking lot and they made contact with one another at 2 MPH. The plaintiff’s car already had a lot of damage due to an accident with a deer a few weeks earlier, but now is trying to get him to pay for it? Archi refuses and is accused of a backup crackup.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Little Women: LA Star in Court!
programme.desc: Alexandria Pham claims Christy Lynn Gibel ran a red light while texting, crashed into her car, and lacks valid insurance. Christy denies fault, arguing Alexandria caused the crash. Now, Alexandria is suing for $3,575.61 in damages.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Mother/Daughter Courtroom Drama
programme.desc: Desherica Smith claims her mother owes her for covering food and bills while she lived there and insists she doesn’t owe rent. Shocked her mom is suing, she feels the case is petty. Desherica believes they’re even and expects to win.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Sex Tape Scandal
programme.desc: Renoda sues her ex’s girlfriend, Cheryl, for $787, alleging she slashed her tires, broke a window, and posted an explicit video online. Cheryl countersues for $1,551, claiming Renoda keyed her car.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Threw Me Out Of Your Taxi

programme.title: The People's Court
